name: Aim Target Shooter HD Free - Shotgun Marksman
name_original: Aim Target Shooter HD Free - Shotgun Marksman
description:
[ MARKSMAN ]

Have you ever wondered how good shotgun shooter you are. Now you have a good change to find out it. Your goal is to shoot flying targets and shoot them as accurately as and as fast as you can. The closer to the center you hit the more points you get. Great simple shooting game. This is also fun way to improve your touching accuracy for the device.

- Easy to learn
- Improve your touching
- Game center hiscore

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other great games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com
